tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "7BB24A40464A6582F17CA080DB9A0620", "A Node War has been declared! Citizens of both Nodes are now flagged as combatants and can attack each other without penalties, like Corruption, for the duration of the war.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "4F5635354780DCE570B7428E5AAE0A30", "Node Wars are made up of a series of objectives that citizens can help achieve. Whichever Node has the most victory points will win the war and reap the benefits.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "5FAB9A6E42567379A6412FBEFFF03DF1", "Check the status and current objectives of a Node War in the Citizenship menu. Band together with your fellow citizens and complete Node War objectives to bring victory to your Node!")
